branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder - Mechanically Jointed - Slide Bearing
branchCategory.description: <p>The rodless cylinder with a slide bearing type comes with on integrated guide.  This can be used in a medium loading situation and allow direct mounting of a work piece.</p>

breadCrumb.name: Rodless Cylinder - Mechanically Jointed - Slide Bearing

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY3M, Mechanically Jointed - Slide Bearing
branchItem.description: <p>The MY3* Rodless Cylinders have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure combined with an outer dust seal band to protect from contaminants.  This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a low profile. The integrated slide bearing internal guide provides lateral stability protecting it from side load impacts. Air cushions are standard and external shock absorbers are optional.</p>

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1M, Mechanically Jointed - Slide Bearing
branchItem.description: <p>The MY1M Rodless Cylinders have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure combined with an outer dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a low profile. The integrated slide bearing internal guide provides lateral stability protecting it from side load impacts. Air cushions are standard and external shock absorbers are optional.</p>
